solution_line_template: On Monday the total number of miles Alice walks to and from school is {miles_to_school} + {miles_home} = <<{miles_to_school}+{miles_home}={monday_total}>>{monday_total} miles.
For the other {num_other_days} days, from Tuesday to Friday, she walks an additional {num_other_days} * {monday_total} = <<{num_other_days}*{monday_total}={other_days_total}>>{other_days_total} miles
The total number of miles she will have walked by Friday {monday_total} + {other_days_total} = <<{monday_total}+{other_days_total}={total_miles}>>{total_miles} miles
